system.controller

Class LeapMotionFrameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.model.LVSObject
      • system.controller.LeapMotionFrameController

  • public class LeapMotionFrameController
extends LVSObject
    This class is the controller of com.leapmotion.leap.Frame Advanced feature such as stabilized hands and fingers information are being calculated from each frame the listener provided.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Andy Tsang

        public com.leapmotion.leap.Vector getNormalizedHand(com.leapmotion.leap.Hand hand)

        Returns:
        normalizedPoint Normalized leapmotion.Vector of the input hand

      • getNormalizedHandPosition

        public int[] getNormalizedHandPosition(com.leapmotion.leap.Hand hand)
        Return the normalized hand position of input hand. The return object is an integer array with extracted information (x,y,z), for further system use.
        Parameters:
        hand - Input hand
        Returns:
        position Integer array of the hand position (x,y,z)

      • getUnstabilizedHand

        public com.leapmotion.leap.Vector getUnstabilizedHand(com.leapmotion.leap.Hand hand)
        Return the unstabilized Hand leapmotion.Vector of input hand by calculating the the hand position with the com.leapmotion.leap.InteractionBox. This function mainly use for speed tracking or dynamic hand.
        Parameters:
        hand - Input Hand
        Returns:
        normalizedPoint Normalized leapmotion.Vector of the input hand

      • getUnstabilizedHandPosition

        public int[] getUnstabilizedHandPosition(com.leapmotion.leap.Hand hand)
        Return the unstabilized hand position of input hand. The return object is an integer array with extracted information (x,y,z), for further system use.
        Parameters:
        hand - Input hand
        Returns:
        position Integer array of the hand position (x,y,z)
